existing_features.title: Revert the entire frontend codebase to its Version 13 state, undoing all changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20. This includes all pages, components, hooks, utilities, styles, and configuration files.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert the entire backend codebase to its Version 13 state, undoing all changes introduced in Versions 14 through 20. This includes the main Motoko actor, data types, CRUD operations, and access control logic.
